summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of S. Director St. from Rainier Ave. S. to 52nd Ave. S.; by constructing a sanitary sewer system and otherwise improving improving the same; all in accordance with Res. No. 25808 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of payment by Bonds.
